en.Top.title: CovidApp - Covid Community Alert
en.Top.subtitle: Anonymously monitor your interactions and find out if you have been exposed to the virus, with no GPS tracking.
en.Top.row1: Our app anonymously monitors the devices that get near you, without using the GPS.
en.Top.row2: If you have been close to an infected person you will be notified and get clear instructions on the next steps to follow.
en.App.title: Download the apps
en.App.subtitle: Coming soon
en.App.email: Receive an email to let you know when it will be available:
en.Social.title: Together we can save lives, share it now
en.Social.text1: Up to 38% additional detected interactions, with respect to common bluetooth solutions.
en.Social.text2: Transparency is important to us! Everything we do is open source and available.
en.Social.text3: We give the possibility to decide the rules and send notifications to patients directly to selected expert virologists.
en.Social.text4: Our platform can detect also patients that don't show any symptomps.
en.Anonymous.title: We are 100% Anonymous and Open Source
en.Anonymous.text: Our system relies only on the anonymous IDs generated by our service, that in no way can be used to obtain personal data.
en.Anonymous.subtitle: Moreover:
en.Anonymous.text3: collect any privat or sensible data, such as name, surname, mobile number.
en.Anonymous.text4: shows on a public map your health status together with the locations you visited or the place you live in.
en.Anonymous.text5: All the produced code necessary for the functioning of the service is open source and available online for review:
en.How.title: How it works
en.How.text1: 1. Every mobile device has a unique and anonymous numeric id, that can be read at distance using high-precision low-distance measurement technology.
en.How.text2: 2. CovidApp continuously scans your surroundings and collects the ids of the phones close to you, storing them in a secure centralized cloud database.
en.How.text3: 3. Our network of certified doctors daily updates the database with the ids of the devices belonging to confirmed Coronavirus infected.
en.How.text4: 4. CovidApp continuously scans your surroundings and collects the ids of the phones close to you, storing them in a secure centralized cloud database.
en.WorkingWith.title: We are working with recognised Health Institutions and Research Centers
en.WorkingWith.description: We are working very closely with the most recognised Health Institutions to distribute the service worldwide.
en.WorkingWith.list1: Raffaele Perego, Director of Research, ISTI-CNR
en.WorkingWith.list2: Vania Bogorny, Head of the Computer Science Graduate Program at Universidade Federal de Santa Catarina (UFSC) - Brazil
en.WorkingWith.list3: Stefano Leonardi, Full Professor at Sapienza University of Rome
en.WorkingWith.list8: Associazione Copernicani - mentor: Stefano Quintarelli - Member of the AI High Level Expert Group at European Commission and Chairman of the steering Committee of Agenzia per l'Italia Digitale (AGID)
en.WorkingWith.list5: Oreste Pollicino, Director of Bocconi LL.M. in Law of Internet Technology and full professor of Constitutional Law at Università Bocconi
en.WorkingWith.list6: Sébastien Bratières, Director of AI, Translated
en.WorkingWith.list7: Sebastian Filetti, STITCH (Sapienza information-based Technology InnovaTion Center for Health)
en.WorkingWith.list9: Stefano Fratepietro, Group Head of Cybersecurity - Chief Security Officer at Be Think, Solve, Execute S.p.A.
en.WorkingWith.footer: Many others are supporting this solutions that, while protecting the citizens, doesn't compromise their privacy.
en.About.title: About us
en.About.p1: The Coronavirus Outbreak Control team consists of 22 people working from four European countries on product development, engineering and operations.
en.About.p2: The team has a multidisciplinary background: 10+ years of experience in distributed architectures and mission critical softwares, founders and lead developers already worked together in the past building worldwide solutions for international partners, such as Airbnb, Google and Microsoft.
en.Protect.title: Protect yourself, protect the humankind
en.Protect.p1:
CovidApp allows you to respond quickly to a Coronavirus exposure, and take the necessary actions to protect your health and contain the spread of the virus.

The anonymous data collected by CovidApp is also helping researchers to study the spread of the virus and find solutions to contain it.
en.Protect.p2: Anonymous data collected by our service also help researchers study the spread of the virus and find solutions to contain it.
en.Help.title: Help the economy of your country
en.Help.p1: When a case of coronavirus is detected, your country’s institutions have to backtrack all the patient activities: who the patient has spent his time with, where the patient has been, etc.
en.Help.p2: This operation is extremely expensive and requires lots of efforts.
en.Help.p3: When the number of infections grows to the point in which this operation can’t be applied to all the cases, governments have to quarantine towns, regions or, even worse, the entire country.
en.Help.p4: With our solution, we will immediately inform whoever has been close to the infected patient during the last 14 days to quarantine him/her-self and we will give him/her precise instructions about how to behave.
en.Help.p5: This new operation is free for the people, free for the Health Institutions and extremely fast. You can protect your country economy just by download this app.
en.Contact.title: Contact us

fr.Top.title: CovidApp - Covid Community Alert
fr.Top.subtitle: Surveillez vos interactions de manière anonyme et découvrez si vous avez été exposé au virus, sans utiliser le GPS
fr.Top.row1: Notre application surveille anonymement les smartphones qui vous approchent, sans utiliser le GPS.
fr.Top.row2: Si vous avez été proche d'une personne infectée, vous recevrez une notification et des instructions claires sur les prochaines étapes à suivre.
fr.App.title: Télécharger nos applications
fr.App.subtitle: En attendant le gouvernement Italien
fr.App.email: Recevez un email pour savoir quand il sera disponible:
fr.Social.title: Ensemble, nous pouvons sauver des vies, partagez-les maintenant
fr.Social.text2: La transparence est importante pour nous! Tout ce que nous faisons est open source et disponible.
fr.Social.text3: Nous donnons la possibilité directement à des virologues experts sélectionnés d'établir les règles et les notifications à envoyer aux patients.
fr.Social.text4: Notre plateforme est également en mesure d'identifier les patients qui ne présentent pas de symptômes.
fr.Anonymous.title: 100% anonyme et open source
fr.Anonymous.text: Notre système est basé uniquement sur des identifiants anonymes générés par notre service, qui ne peuvent en aucun cas être utilisés pour obtenir des données personnelles.
fr.Anonymous.subtitle: Mais surtout:
fr.Anonymous.text1: suit pas les positions GPS des utilisateurs.
fr.Anonymous.text3: collecte aucune donnée privée ou sensible: nom, prénom, numéro de téléphone.
fr.Anonymous.text4: affiche pas sur une carte publique votre état de santé associé aux lieux que vous fréquentez ou à l'endroit où vous vivez.
fr.Anonymous.text5: Tout le code produit nécessaire au fonctionnement du service est open source et disponible en ligne pour analyse:
fr.How.title: Comment ça marche
fr.How.text1:
1. Chaque smartphone est associé à un identifiant anonyme qui peut être lu 
 à distance en utilisant des technologies de haute précision pour 
 de courtes distances.
fr.How.text2:
2. CovidApp recueille tout le temps des identifiants anonymes de téléphones près de chez vous 
, les stockant dans une base de données cloud centralisée et sécurisée.
fr.How.text3: 3. Notre réseau de médecins certifiés met à jour quotidiennement la base de données avec les identifiants des appareils appartenant aux patients ayant contracté le coronavirus.
fr.How.text4:
4. Si vous avez rencontré une personne infectée par le passé, 
 vous recevrez une notification et des instructions claires sur les prochaines étapes 
 à suivre.
fr.WorkingWith.title: Nous collaborons avec des établissements de santé et de recherche reconnus
fr.WorkingWith.description: Nous sommes en traine de travailler en étroite collaboration avec les établissements de santé les plus reconnus pour distribuer le service dans le monde entier.
fr.WorkingWith.list1: Raffaele Perego, Director of Research, ISTI-CNR
fr.WorkingWith.list2: Vania Bogorny, Head of the Computer Science Graduate Program at Universidade Federal de Santa Catarina (UFSC) - Brazil
fr.WorkingWith.list3: Stefano Leonardi, Full Professor at Sapienza University of Rome
fr.WorkingWith.list8: Associazione Copernicani - mentor: Stefano Quintarelli - Member of the AI High Level Expert Group at European Commission and Chairman of the steering Committee of Agenzia per l’Italia Digitale (AGID)
fr.WorkingWith.list5: Oreste Pollicino, Director of Bocconi LL.M. in Law of Internet Technology and full professor of Constitutional Law at Università Bocconi
fr.WorkingWith.list9: Stefano Fratepietro, Group Head of Cybersecurity - Chief Security Officer at Be Think, Solve, Execute S.p.A.
fr.WorkingWith.list6: Sébastien Bratières, Director of AI, Translated
fr.WorkingWith.list7: Sebastian Filetti, STITCH (Sapienza information-based Technology InnovaTion Center for Health)
fr.WorkingWith.footer: Beaucoup soutiennent cette solution car elle protège les citoyens et en même temps protège leur privacy.
fr.About.title: L'équipe
fr.About.p1: L'équipe du Coronavirus Outbreak Control est composée de 22 personnes de six pays différents travaillant sur deux continents.
fr.About.p2: L'équipe a une formation multidisciplinaire: plus de 10 ans d'expérience dans les architectures distribuées et les logiciels critiques. La plupart de l'équipe a déjà collaboré dans le passé pour créer des solutions à l'échelle mondiale pour des partenaires internationaux tels qu'Airbnb, Google et Microsoft.
fr.Protect.title: Protégez-vous, protégez l'humanité
fr.Protect.p1: Notre application nous permet de réagir rapidement aux nouvelles flambées de coronavirus et de prendre les mesures nécessaires pour protéger votre santé et contenir la propagation du virus.
fr.Protect.p2: Les données anonymes collectées par notre service aident également les chercheurs à étudier la propagation du virus et à trouver des solutions pour le contenir.
fr.Help.title: Aidez l'économie de votre pays
fr.Help.p1: Lorsqu'un cas de coronavirus est détecté, les institutions de votre pays doivent analyser toutes les activités passées du patient: avec qui le patient a passé son temps, où était-il, de quel moyen de transport disposait-il? utilisé, etc ...
fr.Help.p2: Cette opération est extrêmement coûteuse et nécessite beaucoup d'efforts.
fr.Help.p3: Lorsque le nombre d'infections augmente au point où cela ne peut pas être appliqué dans tous les cas, les gouvernements doivent mettre en quarantaine les villes, les régions ou, pire encore, l'ensemble du pays.
fr.Help.p4: Avec notre solution, nous informerons immédiatement toute personne ayant été proche du patient infecté au cours des 14 derniers jours pour l'informer et lui donner des instructions précises sur la façon de se comporter, augmentant ainsi l'efficacité de la quarantaine.
fr.Help.p5: Ce nouveau processus est gratuit pour les citoyens, gratuit pour les établissements de santé et extrêmement rapide. Vous pouvez protéger l'économie de votre pays en téléchargeant simplement cette application.
fr.Contact.title: Contactez-nous

it.Top.title: CovidApp - Covid Community Alert
it.Top.subtitle: Monitora anonimamente le tue interazioni e scopri se sei stato esposto al virus, senza tracciamento GPS.
it.Top.row1: La nostra app monitora anonimamente gli smartphone che si avvicinano a te, senza usare il GPS.
it.Top.row2: Se stai stato vicino ad una persona infetta, riceverai una notifica e chiare istruzioni sui passaggi successivi da seguire.
it.App.title: Scarica le nostre App
it.App.subtitle: In attesa del Governo Italiano
it.App.email: Ricevi un’email per sapere quando sarà disponibile:
it.Social.title: Insieme possiamo salvare vite, condividi ora
it.Social.text1: Fino a +38% di interazioni individuate, rispetto a comuni soluzioni bluetooth
it.Social.text2: La trasparenza per noi è importante! Tutto quello che facciamo è open source e disponibile.
it.Social.text3: Diamo la possibilità direttamente a virologi esperti selezionati di stabilire le regole e le notifiche da mandare ai pazienti.
it.Social.text4: La nostra piattaforma è in grado di individuare anche i pazienti che non presentano sintomi.
it.Anonymous.title: 100% Anonimo e Open Source
it.Anonymous.text: Il nostro sistema si basa solo su degli ID anonimi generati dal nostro servizio, che non possono in alcun modo essere utilizzati per ottenere dati personali.
it.Anonymous.subtitle: Ma soprattutto:
it.Anonymous.text1: traccia le posizioni GPS degli utenti.
it.Anonymous.text3: raccoglie alcun dato privato o sensibile: nome, cognome, numero di telefono.
it.Anonymous.text4: espone su di una mappa pubblica il tuo stato di salute associato ai luoghi che frequenti o al posto in cui vivi.
it.Anonymous.text5: Tutto il codice prodotto e necessario per il funzionamento del servizio è open source e disponibile online per essere analizzato:
it.How.title: Come funziona
it.How.text1:
1. Ogni smartphone è associato ad un identificativo anonimo che può
          essere letto a distanza usando la tecnologie di alta precisione per
          brevi distanze.
it.How.text2:
2. CovidApp raccoglie costantemente gli ID anonimi dei telefoni vicino
          a te, memorizzandoli in un database cloud centralizzato sicuro.
it.How.text3:
3. La nostra rete di medici certificati aggiorna quotidianamente il
          database con gli ID dei dispositivi appartenenti a pazienti che hanno
          contratto il coronavirus.
it.How.text4:
4. Se sei stato in prossimità di una persona infetta in passato,
          riceverai una notifica e chiare istruzioni sui passaggi successivi da
          seguire.
it.WorkingWith.title: Collaboriamo con istituti sanitari e di ricerca riconosciuti
it.WorkingWith.description: Stiamo lavorando a stretto contatto con le istituzioni sanitarie più riconosciute per distribuire il servizio in tutto il mondo.
it.WorkingWith.list1: Raffaele Perego, Director of Research, ISTI-CNR
it.WorkingWith.list2: Vania Bogorny, Head of the Computer Science Graduate Program at Universidade Federal de Santa Catarina (UFSC) - Brazil
it.WorkingWith.list3: Stefano Leonardi, Full Professor at Sapienza University of Rome
it.WorkingWith.list8: Associazione Copernicani - mentor: Stefano Quintarelli - Member of the AI High Level Expert Group at European Commission and Chairman of the steering Committee of Agenzia per l’Italia Digitale (AGID)
it.WorkingWith.list5: Oreste Pollicino, Director of Bocconi LL.M. in Law of Internet Technology and full professor of Constitutional Law at Università Bocconi
it.WorkingWith.list9: Stefano Fratepietro, Group Head of Cybersecurity - Chief Security Officer at Be Think, Solve, Execute S.p.A.
it.WorkingWith.list6: Sébastien Bratières, Director of AI, Translated
it.WorkingWith.list7: Sebastian Filetti, STITCH (Sapienza information-based Technology InnovaTion Center for Health)
it.WorkingWith.footer: In molti stanno supportando questa soluzione che, nel proteggere i cittadini, non mette in secondo piano la loro privacy.
it.About.title: Chi siamo
it.About.p1: Il team di Coronavirus Outbreak Control è composto da 22 persone da sei paesi differenti che lavorano da due continenti.
it.About.p2: Il team ha un background multidisciplinare: oltre 10 anni di esperienza in architetture distribuite e software mission-critical. La maggior parte del team ha già collaborato in passato alla costruzione di soluzioni di scala globale per partner internazionali come Airbnb, Google e Microsoft.
it.Protect.title: Proteggi te stesso, proteggi l'umanità
it.Protect.p1: La nostra app ci consente di rispondere rapidamente a nuovi focolai di Coronavirus e di intraprendere le azioni necessarie per proteggere la tua salute e contenere la diffusione del virus.
it.Protect.p2: I dati anonimi raccolti dal nostro servizio aiutano anche i ricercatori a studiare la diffusione del virus e trovare soluzioni per contenerlo.
it.Help.title: Aiuta l'economia del tuo paese
it.Help.p1: Quando viene rilevato un caso di coronavirus, le istituzioni del tuo paese devono analizzare tutte le attività passate del paziente: con chi il paziente ha trascorso il suo tempo, dove è stato il paziente, quali mezzi di trasporto ha usato, ecc...
it.Help.p2: Questa operazione è estremamente costosa e richiede molti sforzi.
it.Help.p3: Quando il numero di infezioni aumenta al punto in cui questa operazione non può essere applicata a tutti i casi, i governi devono mettere in quarantena città, regioni o, peggio ancora, l'intero paese.
it.Help.p4: Con la nostra soluzione, informeremo immediatamente chiunque sia stato vicino al paziente infetto negli ultimi 14 giorni per informarlo e fornirgli istruzioni precise su come comportarsi, aumentando l'efficienza della quarantena.
it.Help.p5: Questo nuovo processo è gratuito per i cittadini, gratuito per le istituzioni sanitarie ed estremamente veloce. Puoi proteggere l'economia del tuo paese semplicemente scaricando questa app.
it.Contact.title: Contattaci
